trans-unit.source: We were unable to send you a new password.
trans-unit.target: Nismo uspeli da Vam pošaljemo novu lozinku.

trans-unit.source: We were unable to send you an email. We are investigating the problem and working towards resolving it.
trans-unit.target: Nismo uspeli da Vam pošaljemo email. Radimo na detektovanju i rešavanju problema.

trans-unit.source: There is no registered profile with this email address
trans-unit.target: Ne postoji registrovan profil sa ovom email adresom

trans-unit.source: Unable to find user to activate
trans-unit.target: Nismo uspeli da pronađemo korisnika za aktivaciju

trans-unit.source: Related account has already been activated
trans-unit.target: Povezani nalog je već aktiviran

trans-unit.source: An error ocurred while trying to activate your account.
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do greške pri pokušaju aktivacije vašeg naloga.

trans-unit.source: Day, month and year are mandatory fields
trans-unit.target: Dan, mesec i godina su obavezna polja

trans-unit.source: Username "%value%" cannot be used
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime "%value%" ne može da se koristi

trans-unit.source: The username "%value%" contains characters that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime "%value%" sadrži karaktere koji nisu dozvoljeni

trans-unit.source: Username must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime mora sadržati najmanje %min_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Username cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime ne može imati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Invalid email – your email is not in the correct format
trans-unit.target: Email adresa nije u odgovarajućoj formi

trans-unit.source: Your password should be at least %min_length% characters long
trans-unit.target: Vaša lozinka treba imati najmanje %min_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Your password cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Vaša lozinka ne može imati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: The passwords do not match
trans-unit.target: Lozinke se ne podudaraju

trans-unit.source: This email address has already been registered by another user
trans-unit.target: Ovu email adresu koristi drugi korisnik

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory. Please start typing the name of your home location and select from the list.
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje je obavezno. Počnite da unosite naziv vaše lokacije i selektujte je iz liste.

trans-unit.source: You have entered the text incorrectly. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Uneli ste tekst nepravilno. Pokušajte ponovo.

trans-unit.source: Email is required
trans-unit.target: Email adresa je obavezna

trans-unit.source: You must select a file to upload
trans-unit.target: Morate selektovati fajl

trans-unit.source: The file you submitted is not in a valid format. Please upload a JPG, GIF or PNG image file.
trans-unit.target: Fajl koji ste selektovali nije u validnom formatu. Selektujte fajl u JPG, GIF ili PNG formatu.

trans-unit.source: The file you submitted is not in a valid format. Please upload a JPG, GIF or PNG image file.
trans-unit.target: Fajl koji ste selektovali nije u validnom formatu. Selektujte fajl u JPG, GIF ili PNG formatu.

trans-unit.source: File size limit is 4MB.Please reduce file size before submitting again.
trans-unit.target: Dozvoljena veličina fajla je 4MB

trans-unit.source: File size limit is 2MB.Please reduce file size.
trans-unit.target: Dozvoljena veličina fajla je 2MB

trans-unit.source: The review cannot contain more than %max_length% characters. Shorten your review.
trans-unit.target: Preporuka ne može sadržati više od %max_length% karaktera. Skratite vašu preporuku.

trans-unit.source: The review must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Preporuka mora sadržati najmanje %min_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: The answer must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Odgovor mora sadržati najmanje %min_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: The review cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Preporuka ne može sadržati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Type Review
trans-unit.target: Napišite preporuku

trans-unit.source: The field is mandatory
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje je obavezno

trans-unit.source: Select Your Position
trans-unit.target: Odaberite svoju poziciju

trans-unit.source: Invalid Phone Number
trans-unit.target: broj telefona nije ispravan

trans-unit.source: This field cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje ne može sadržati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Select company type
trans-unit.target: Odaberite tip firme

trans-unit.source: The field cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje ne može sadržati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: The field must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Polje mora sadržati najmanje %min_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Invalid format. E.g. http://www.getlokal.rs
trans-unit.target: Format nije validan. Primer: http://www.getlokal.rs

trans-unit.source: Invalid format. E.g. getlokal.rs!
trans-unit.target: Format nije validan. Primer: getlokal.rs

trans-unit.source: Invalid format. E.g. http://blog.getlokal.rs
trans-unit.target: Format nije validan. Primer: http://blog.getlokal.rs

trans-unit.source: Invalid format. E.g. http://twitter.com/@getlokal
trans-unit.target: Format nije validan. Primer: http://twitter.com/@getlokal

trans-unit.source: Invalid format. E.g. http://www.facebook.com/#!/getlokal
trans-unit.target: Format nije validan. Primer: http://www.facebook.com/#!/getlokal

trans-unit.source: Select Your Position
trans-unit.target: Odaberite svoju poziciju

trans-unit.source: The new password was sent successfully to the email you provided.
trans-unit.target: Nova lozinka je uspešno poslata na email adresu koju ste prijavili pri registraciji.

trans-unit.source: Invalid format. E.g. http://www.facebook.com/getlokal
trans-unit.target: Format nije validan. Primer: http://www.facebook.com/getlokal

trans-unit.source: Type an Answer
trans-unit.target: Upišite odgovor

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of vouchers issued per user cannot exceed the total number of vouchers for the offer
trans-unit.target: Broj vaučera po korisniku ne može biti veći od ukupnog broja vaučera u ponudi

trans-unit.source: The offer end date cannot be earlier than the start date
trans-unit.target: Datum isteka ponude ne može biti pre datuma njenog početka

trans-unit.source: The voucher valid to date cannot be earlier than the offer end date
trans-unit.target: Vaučer mora važiti do datuma isteka ponude

trans-unit.source: Description must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Opis mora sadržati najmanje %min_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: The description cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Opis ne može sadržati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: Description "%value%" contains forbidden words
trans-unit.target: Opis "%value%" sadrži zabranjene reči

trans-unit.source: The video title cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Naziv Videa ne može sadržati više od %max_length% karaktera

trans-unit.source: The email message was not sent successfully.
trans-unit.target: Email poruka nije poslata.

trans-unit.source: An error ocurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Prilikom obrade Vašeg zahteva došlo je do greške. Molimo pokušajte ponovo.

trans-unit.source: This username has already been registered by another user
trans-unit.target: Ovo korisničko ime je već registrovano.

trans-unit.source: Abuse type is required.
trans-unit.target: Polje za prijavu zloupotrebe je obavezno.

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory. Please select your country name from the list.
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje je obavezno. Označi naziv svoje zemlje iz liste.
